ISSUE.TITLE: Help: Initial configuration: my port is not 3306. It's 31106.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Please provide dev environment versions of your system node -v ( xmysql requires node >= 7.6.0 ) npm -v mysql --version xmysql --version - - - Provide steps to reproduce this issue or Provide minimum code to reproduce this issue or HTTP request,response,error snapshot of this issue - - - Mark issue with suitable label if it is clear what this issue is. How to connect mysql by port: 31106? Thanks. xmysql -h localhost -u mysqlUsername -p mysqlPassword -d databaseName
